archiefmat.titel_eng: Letters prepared by the Secretary's office
archiefmat.scope: Contains mainly first drafts of administrative correspondence between the Government Secretary and authorities (Governor, Attorney General, Colonial Council, District Commissioners etc.) in Suriname, but occasionally also to individuals or private organizations. Usually it only concerns copies of accompanying letters to all sorts of documents (concept-regulations, passports, returns etc.) Contains occasionally also correspondence received (petitions, documents sent by the Ministry of Colonies) from various authorities (Attorney General, District Commissioners) and private persons. Occasionally mentioned appendices are filed with the accompanying letters.
archiefmat.notes: The data presented are based on a draft of the inventory of the archive (December 2008); numbers of the documents may change in the final version. The complete series up to 1954 consists of 421 nos.
